title: Is We Dumb? | Flamingo. Safety Net. Wallet. Expanding Foam.
description:
Listen... we're not doctors, but spraying expanding foam in your pee hole as an attempt to cure impotence seems like a really bad idea. Let's talk about that, being hungover for the rest of your life, hot sauce that is WAY too hot for human consumption, customized c*m rags, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

 

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

 

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/NUVHRI7J_uA

 

Suggestions for segment content: dumb@iswedumb.com
